full_summary:
### Aviation Replacement Parts for the Chinook
#### Solicitation Number: W8485-237292/A
#### Amendment Number: 1

This is an amendment to the original Request for Supply Arrangement (RFS Solicitation: W8485-237292/A). The purpose of this amendment is to update the supplier list for the Chinook aviation replacement parts.

#### Additional Information

*   The Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) is being issued by the Department of National Defence (DND) to establish a Supply Arrangement (SA) for the procurement of Aviation Replacement Parts for the Chinook.
*   The current amendment removes Vector Aerospace from the supplier list and adds Simex Defence.
*   The RFP amendment documents will be emailed directly to the Qualified SA Holders who are invited to bid on this requirement.
*   Due to the increase in qualified bidders, the procurement is an ongoing opportunity for qualification. A list of qualified bidders will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS). Suppliers wishing to become qualified for this arragement should submit a request to Samantha Coles, Supply Team Leader, at samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.
*   The proposal due date has closed and the service has expired.

#### Contact Information

*   The Contracting Authority is Pauk, Oleksandr at the Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM) Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada.
*   For inquiries and requests for information, please contact Pauk, Oleksandr at oleksandr.pauk@forces.gc.ca.
*   Email and phone information is available above.

#### Regions of Opportunity

*   The opportunity is available nationwide in Canada, with a specific focus on the National Capital Region (NCR) and Quebec (except NCR).

#### Notice Posting

*   The notice was last updated on 2022-08-18 and had a deadline of 2022-08-24T14:00:00. As the deadline has expired, the opportunity is no longer an active call for bids. The catering agreement is now an open call for suppliers that wish to take part in the public bid process. 

### Suppliers with Questions

If you are a supplier with questions or a request for clarification regarding this Solicitation, please reach out to the Contracting Authority, Pauk, Oleksandr directly. Please note that Department Specific Documentation will not be uploaded on the GETS
